item.title: 李维-斯特劳斯（Levi Strauss）因成本节约和折扣减少而上调利润预期
item.description: 李维-施特劳斯（Levi Strauss）周三上调了年度利润预期，理由是这家服装制造商最近通过裁员节省了成本，而且牛仔裤和牛仔服装的折扣力度也有所减弱，从而使其股价在盘后交易中上涨了 7%。【原文：Levi Strauss raised its annual profit forecast on Wednesday, citing the apparel maker's recent cost savings from job cuts and less aggressive discounts on its jeans and denim clothing, sending its shares up 7% in extended trading.】

item.title: 据彭博社报道，Redstone、Skydance 就派拉蒙股份达成临时协议
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周三援引熟知内情的人士的话报道，电视巨头派拉蒙全球公司的控股股东莎莉-雷德斯通（Shari Redstone）已就向大卫-埃里森（David Ellison）的 Skydance Media 出售其所持股份达成了初步协议。【原文：Shari Redstone, the controlling shareholder of TV giant Paramount Global , has reached a tentative agreement to sell her stake in the company to David Ellison's Skydance Media, Bloomberg News reported on Wednesday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 美国 FDA 批准 Basilea 制药公司生产抗生素
item.description: 美国食品和药物管理局（FDA）周三表示，美国卫生监管机构批准了 Basilea Pharmaceutica 用于治疗细菌感染（包括耐多药菌株）的抗生素。【原文：The U.S. health regulator approved Basilea Pharmaceutica's antibiotic for bacterial infections including multidrug-resistant strains, the FDA said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 英伟达供应商 SK 海力士将投资 38.7 亿美元建设美国芯片封装厂
item.description: 全球第二大内存芯片制造商 SK 海力士周三表示，将投资约 38.7 亿美元，在美国印第安纳州建设先进的封装厂和人工智能产品研发设施。【原文：SK Hynix , the world's second-largest memory chip maker, said on Wednesday it will invest around $3.87 billion to build an advanced packaging plant and research and development facility for AI products in the U.S. state of Indiana.】

item.title: 加拿大 RBC 银行首席执行官称城市国民银行将成为 "净贡献者
item.description: 加拿大皇家银行（Royal Bank of Canada）首席执行官戴夫-麦凯（Dave McKay）周三告诉路透社，加拿大皇家银行预计其在美国陷入困境的部门将成为加拿大最大的贷款机构的 "净贡献者"，并看好边境以南的机遇。【原文：Royal Bank of Canada expects its struggling unit in the U.S. to be "a net contributor" to Canada's biggest lender and is bullish about the opportunities south of the border, CEO Dave McKay told Reuters on Wednesday.】

item.title: Downdetector 显示，Meta's WhatsApp 已瘫痪数千人
item.description: 据停机跟踪网站 Downdetector.com 称，Meta Platforms 旗下的 WhatsApp 周三有数千名用户停机。【原文：Meta Platforms-owned WhatsApp was down for thousands of users on Wednesday, according to outage tracking website Downdetector.com.】

item.title: 文件显示，欧盟放弃了网络安全认证计划中的主权要求
item.description: 根据路透社看到的文件，在网络安全标签规则草案取消了供应商应独立于非欧盟法律的要求后，亚马逊、Alphabet 旗下的谷歌和微软可能会发现更容易竞标欧盟云计算合同。【原文：Amazon , Alphabet's Google and Microsoft may find it easier to bid for EU cloud computing contracts after draft cybersecurity labelling rules scrapped a requirement that vendors should be independent from non-EU laws, according to the document seen by Reuters.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士：波音 737 的产出率在 3 月下旬达到个位数
item.description: 业内人士告诉路透社，由于美国监管机构加强了对工厂的检查，工人们放慢了西雅图郊外装配线的速度以完成未完成的工作，波音737 MAX的产量在最近几周急剧下降。【原文：Boeing 737 MAX production has fallen sharply in recent weeks as U.S. regulators step up factory checks and workers slow the assembly line outside Seattle to complete outstanding work, industry sources told Reuters.】

item.title: 梅赛德斯-奔驰拒绝接受美国工会投诉后的 "反工会 "指控
item.description: 梅赛德斯-奔驰（Mercedes-Benz）周三表示，梅赛德斯-奔驰承认其员工组建代表的权利，此前一家美国汽车工人工会称已就梅赛德斯-奔驰在阿拉巴马州工厂开展的 "反工会 "活动提出投诉。【原文：Mercedes-Benz on Wednesday said it recognises the right of its employees to form representatives after a U.S. auto workers union said it had filed complaints about the carmaker's "anti-union" campaign in its Alabama factory.】

item.title: 法官在专利之争中支持 Arbutus，Moderna 股价下跌
item.description: 在美国法官发布命令，加强 Arbutus 在与 Moderna 的拳头产品 COVID-19 疫苗有关的专利侵权诉讼中的论据后，Moderna 的股价周三下跌了 4%。【原文：Shares of Moderna fell 4% on Wednesday after a U.S. judge issued an order that strengthened Arbutus' arguments in a patent infringement lawsuit related to Moderna's blockbuster COVID-19 vaccines.】

item.title: 两人承认在特朗普宣布贷款前参与柯达内幕交易
item.description: 周三，一名前制药公司高管和他的表弟承认了伊士曼柯达公司的内幕交易罪，因为他们得到线报，该公司正在安排一笔来自特朗普政府的 7.65 亿美元贷款，用于生产药物成分。【原文：A former pharmaceutical executive and his cousin pleaded guilty on Wednesday to insider trading in Eastman Kodak , based on tips that the company was arranging a surprise $765 million loan from the Trump administration to make drug ingredients.】

item.title: 迪士尼首席执行官鲍勃-艾格的继任者选拔进入白热化阶段
item.description: 随着华特迪士尼与激进投资者纳尔逊-佩尔茨（Nelson Peltz）长达数月的代理权争夺战成为历史，人们的注意力重新聚焦于寻找首席执行官鲍勃-艾格（Bob Iger）的继任者。【原文：With Walt Disney’s months-long proxy war with activist investor Nelson Peltz in the rear-view mirror, attention is refocused on finding CEO Bob Iger’s successor.】

item.title: 巴西希望 COP30 气候峰会促进生态旅游发展
item.description: 巴西旅游官员希望通过明年在亚马逊雨林城市贝伦主办联合国气候会谈，改变巴西仅仅是衣着暴露的海滩游客天堂的形象。【原文：Brazilian tourism officials are hoping to change the country's image as a mere haven for scantily-clad beachgoers by hosting U.N. climate talks next year in the Amazon rainforest city of Belem that will focus on environmental sustainability and ending deforestation to slow global warming.】

item.title: 如果微软挖走 Inflection 员工预示着更广泛的趋势，欧盟维斯塔格或将采取行动
item.description: 欧盟反垄断局局长玛格丽特-维斯塔格（Margrethe Vestager）周三表示，欧盟监管机构已经注意到微软雇佣了人工智能初创公司Inflection的大部分员工，包括其联合创始人，如果其他公司采取类似行动，欧盟监管机构可能会采取行动，使之成为一种趋势。【原文：EU regulators have noted Microsoft's hiring of most of artificial intelligence startup Inflection's staff including its co-founders and may act if other companies act similarly, making it a trend, EU antitrust chief Margrethe Vestager said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 捷蓝航空公司飞行员就新劳资协议展开谈判
item.description: 航空公司飞行员协会（ALPA）代表的近 5000 名飞行员周三表示，该工会已向捷蓝航空公司发出通知，要求就新的集体谈判协议展开谈判。【原文：Nearly 5,000 pilots represented by the Air Line Pilots Association (ALPA) served a notice to JetBlue Airways to open negotiations for a new collective bargaining agreement, the union said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 美联储鲍威尔重申有时间考虑降息问题
item.description: 美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）周三重申，鉴于经济强劲和近期的高通胀读数，美国央行有时间考虑首次降息。【原文：Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell reiterated on Wednesday that the U.S. central bank has time to deliberate over its first interest rate cut given the strength of the economy and recent high inflation readings.】

item.title: 独家报道：边疆航空公司空乘人员反对运营大修，要求谈判
item.description: 边疆航空公司（Frontier Airlines）的空乘人员正在反对对该公司的运营进行全面改革--这是该公司扭亏为盈战略的一个关键要素--他们说，这些改革不在他们的劳动协议范围之内，而且会 "极大地改变 "他们的生活。【原文：Flight attendants at Frontier Airlines are opposing an overhaul to the airline's operations - a key element of its turnaround strategy - saying the changes are not covered by their labor agreement and will "drastically upend" their lives.】

item.title: Ulta Beauty 首席执行官警告第一季度需求低迷，拖累同行，业绩下滑
item.description: Ulta Beauty 公司高管表示，第一季度各品类需求放缓，拖累了同行 elf Beauty、Coty 和 Estee Lauder 的业绩，该公司股价周三暴跌 14%。【原文：Shares of Ulta Beauty tumbled as much as 14% on Wednesday after executives flagged a slowdown in demand across categories in the first quarter, dragging down peers elf Beauty, Coty and Estee Lauder.】

item.title: Stellantis 首席执行官：未来十年汽车行业必须将电动汽车电池重量减半
item.description: Stellantis 公司负责人周三表示，汽车行业必须在未来 10 年内将电动汽车电池的重量减轻 50%，才能使电气化对环境产生意义。【原文：The automotive industry will have to reduce the weight of EV batteries by 50% in the next 10 years to make electrification environmentally meaningful, the head of Stellantis said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 美国 FDA 称，礼来公司生产的部分剂量 Zepbound 在 4 月底前供应短缺
item.description: 美国卫生监管机构网站显示，由于需求增加，礼来公司的两剂减肥药Zepbound将限量供应到4月底。【原文：Two doses of Eli Lilly's weight-loss drug, Zepbound, would be available in limited amounts through end of April due to increased demand, the U.S. health regulator's website showed.】

item.title: 好市多为会员提供包括药物在内的减肥计划
item.description: 好市多批发公司（Costco Wholesale）将为其会员提供减肥计划，包括在线医疗服务提供商芝麻公司（Sesame）提供的处方药 Ozempic 和 Wegovy。【原文：Costco Wholesale will offer its members access to weight-loss programs, including prescription drugs Ozempic and Wegovy, from online healthcare services provider Sesame, as the companies expanded their partnership.】

item.title: 美国债券经理人 PIMCO 认为美联储将在年中降息，但会逐步放宽政策
item.description: 美国债券巨头 PIMCO 周三表示，美联储很可能在今年年中开始降息，但与其他发达市场相比，美国的宽松周期将更加渐进。【原文：The Federal Reserve is likely to start cutting interest rates midyear but the easing cycle will be more gradual in the United States than in other developed markets, U.S. bond giant PIMCO said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 让特朗普媒体上市的公司投资者承认内幕交易罪
item.description: 美国前总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的媒体业务上市的公司的一名早期投资者周三在曼哈顿承认了联邦内幕交易指控。【原文：An early investor in the company that took former U.S. President Donald Trump's media business public pleaded guilty in Manhattan on Wednesday to a federal insider trading charge.】

item.title: 台积电在台湾地震后停止工地施工
item.description: 全球最大的合约芯片制造商台湾积体电路制造股份有限公司周三表示，受 7.2 级地震影响，该公司在台湾的建筑工地已暂停施工。【原文：Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co , the world's biggest contract chipmaker, said on Wednesday it has suspended work at its construction sites in Taiwan as a fallout of the 7.2 magnitude earthquake.】

item.title: 美国服务业 3 月份温和扩张；价格压力有所缓解
item.description: 3 月份，美国服务业增长进一步放缓，而衡量企业支付投入的价格降至四年来的最低点，这对通胀前景是个好兆头。【原文：U.S. services industry growth slowed further in March, while a measure of prices paid by businesses for inputs dropped to a four-year low, which bodes well for the inflation outlook.】

item.title: 华尔街准备迎接美国税季流动性考验
item.description: 华尔街正在为货币市场可能出现的压力做准备，在美国税日到来之前将一些现金放在一边，届时与税收相关的大量资金外流可能会损害市场的流动性。【原文：Wall Street is bracing for a potential bout of stress in money markets by putting some cash on the side ahead of U.S. tax day, when high tax-related outflows could hurt market liquidity.】

item.title: 美联储主席博斯蒂克称今年第四季度将首次降息
item.description: 亚特兰大联储主席拉斐尔-博斯蒂克（Raphael Bostic）周三表示，美联储在今年年底之前不应下调基准利率，他坚持认为美国央行在2024年期间只应降低一次借贷成本。【原文：The Federal Reserve should not cut its benchmark interest rate until the end of this year, Atlanta Fed President Raphael Bostic said on Wednesday, as he maintained his view that the U.S. central bank should reduce borrowing costs only once over the course of 2024.】

item.title: 据 The Information 报道，亚马逊网络服务公司裁员数百名技术和销售人员
item.description: 据新闻网站 The Information 周三报道，亚马逊网络服务公司（Amazon Web Services）已在其负责实体零售店技术的部门裁员数百人，并在其销售、营销和全球服务部门裁员数百人。【原文：Amazon Web Services has laid off a few hundred employees in its unit that works on technology for physical retail stores, and several hundred more in its sales, marketing and global services division, news site The Information reported on Wednesday.】

item.title: 汽车托运公司 Wallenius Wilhelmsen 因巴尔的摩灾难损失高达 1,000 万美元
item.description: 挪威汽车运输公司Wallenius Wilhelmsen周三表示，上周美国巴尔的摩桥梁坍塌事故预计将对公司核心盈利造成500万至1000万美元的损失，并预计主要航道将关闭数周。【原文：Norwegian car shipping firm Wallenius Wilhelmsen estimates a $5 million to $10 million hit to core earnings from last week's U.S. Baltimore bridge collapse and expects the key ship channel to be closed for weeks, it said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 福特第一季度美国汽车销量增长 6.8%
item.description: 福特汽车公司（Ford Motor Co）报告称，受皮卡和跨界 SUV 需求的推动，第一季度美国汽车销量增长了 6.8%。【原文：Ford Motor Co reported a 6.8% rise in first-quarter U.S. auto sales, driven by demand for its pickup trucks and crossover SUVs.】
